context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz could do is to
generation: reach out to various charities and organizations that may be able to assist financially
set up a fundraising campaign or ask for help from family and friends to raise the money needed for the medication
explore options such as:
seek assistance from organizations that provide help with medical expenses
start a fundraising campaign to raise money for the medication
look for programs or organizations that provide financial assistance for expensive medicines
rob the pharmacy where the medicine is held, but it would be illegal and could potentially lead to harmful consequences
reach out to the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication to ask for assistance
steal the drug from the pharmacy
try and find alternate ways of acquiring the money

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to
generation: call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-sharing service that could pick him up from his location and get him to the airport as quickly as possible
call a taxi or a ride-hailing service such as Uber or Lyft
call a taxi, Uber, or another ride-hailing service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber or Lyft to quickly get him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or other ride-hailing service to quickly get him to the airport while his car is being taken care of
call a taxi, ride-sharing service, or a friend to come pick him up
call a taxi or use a ride sharing app like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport
call for a taxi, car service, or ride-share (like Uber or Lyft) to pick him up from where he is broken down and take him the rest of the way to the airport
call a taxi, uber, or a friend to help him get to the airport on time
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other rideshare service

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.

generation: take $50
add his own money to the register to make up for the missing amount
pay the difference from his own pocket
add his own money to the register to cover for the missing amount
pay the missing amount from his own money
put in his own $50
replace the missing money from his own pocket
cover the missing amount with his own money
pay the missing amount from his own pocket
take the missing amount from his own personal money and put it in the register to balance it

context_3.vignette: Liz decides to go to the gym on her lunch break because she is going to have to work late tonight and won't have time during the evening. When she gets to the gym, she realizes that her membership has expired since she last went.

renew her gym membership

renew her membership on the spot and continue with her planned workout

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary could do is to
generation: call or text her mom and ask her to bring the assignment to school before the class ends
immediately contact her teacher, explain the situation and ask for an extension to turn in the homework
try to explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension so she can submit the work the next day or later
explain the situation to her teacher and request for more time to submit the assignment
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the homework the next day

explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could bring the assignment the next day, showing proof of the completed assignment like a photograph or get a note from her mom confirming the mistake
explain the situation to her teacher, possibly showing any evidence she may have such as drafts or notes of the assignment on her computer, and request for an extension to submit the assignment
call or text her mother to see if she can quickly drop off the assignment or email a digital copy to Mary that she can print at school
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension so she can bring the assignment the following day
quickly call or text her mom to bring the homework to school if possible, or alternatively, explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the assignment

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: build a shelter to protect themselves from the cold
start rationing the remaining food and water
build a temporary shelter for warmth and gather food and water from the surroundings
find a sheltered spot to set up a camp
start a fire for warmth and to signal their location to any potential rescuers
build a fire to keep warm, melt snow for drinking water, and try to hunt or forage for food while they wait for the rescue crew
use his knowledge of survival skills to help them make the best of their situation
find a sheltered place for them to stay and concentrate on methods to preserve body heat, and ration their food and water supplies
create a signal for help
build a shelter and a fire to stay warm and visible
